name: Flowery panic
description:
----------------Control----------------

WASD : Walk

Space : Interact

--------------Description--------------

Your Flower has 2 health, water and sun. If any of it reached zero game over

to refill water health, walk to the pump and Interact with it. Make sure you have your flower in your hand

you can grab flower by pressing the space when near it

the pump has a limited uses, to restock it, you will need to catch 5 blue thing and then interact with the big water tank (the one in the top right corner) when restocking your pump the pump only reset. so use it wisely

To refill the sun health, you will either need to stand in the sunlight, or put down your flower in the sunlight.
